Title: Tom Connolly (No. 11)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), John Eisendrath, Jon Bokenkamp, Amanda Kate Shuman (executive story editor), Brandon Margolis (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Liz discovers she's been framed by The Cabal, prompting Red to tap into his connections to clear her name. Also: Cooper receives stunning news; and the task force is plagued by trust issues.
